title: Magazine Fonts
content:
is there a resource that lists every typeface that is used by magazines on the newstand? has an article ever been written?

please help, i am very curious!

 [‹ (x) Macromedia fonts - Vonnes {Tiff, Franz, Addison}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023815/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4252 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Conqueror logo - TF Forever {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023815/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16706 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toddpstyle

comments.content:
Nope. And nope. Sorry. :^/

I mean, that would be a hell of a lot of work. How many magazines are out there, really?

There was a [survey made of 100 American newspapers](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023815/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/22368.html) that I saw which catalogued typefaces used on the front pages. This is the closest I have seen to something that would answer your question, in a way. I know of nothing that does it for magazines, although I have considered it as a project. Any volunteers to help? Maybe we could start a list.

- Mike Yanega

Interesting question.  
FB and Ascender did a study of the top 100 Newspapers in USA.  
FB recently expanded the study to an additional 150 international newspapers.  
We have been working on a magazine study that hoefully will be done early next year.

Cool.  
When will the two further studies be published?

hhp
